code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';function getResponseData(response){if(!response.ok){return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(response.status));}return response.json();}export function register(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(getResponseData);};export function authorize(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(getResponseData);};export function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(getResponseData);}
